metadata.Plot: 11 years after "Los Olvidados" we get to see Alfonso Mejia again, only now in trouble with School's rules due to his same misconduct. They're young and can get away with it, but tomorrow they will be men... and... will they have the tools to go ahead in life? Will they be prepared to solve whatever obstacles in their path? Martínez de Hoyos' speech after the event that forever changed his life is breathtaking and true, even in today's standards... In the youth group we can see Martha Elena Cervantes, Silvia Fournier, Ma. Eugenia San Martin, Fernando Lujan and his brother Alejandro Ciangherotti, while among the grown ups we can admire the experience of Hortensia Santoveña, David Silva, Jorge Martinez de Hoyos...
metadata.Actors: Alfonso Mejía, Silvia Fournier, María Eugenia San Martín
